description: Prefix `is` must not be used with postfix `Exist`. Method: Spryker\Zed\StockAddress\Persistence\StockAddressRepository::isStockAddressExistsForStock().
Postfix `Exists` must be in the end of method name. Method: Spryker\Zed\StockAddress\Persistence\StockAddressRepository::isStockAddressExistsForStock().
